lead_paragraph: Fortuna Düsseldorf will return to the Bundesliga for the first time since 1996-97, beating Hertha Berlin, 4-3, on aggregate after a 2-2 tie.
snippet: Fortuna Düsseldorf will return to the Bundesliga for the first time since 1996-97, beating Hertha Berlin, 4-3, on aggregate after a 2-2 tie.
